Text: Is this just me, or didn't they master it especially for the Vinyl? It doesn't feel like there's more dynamic than on the CD release....

^^^ forget about dynamic range, mastering, etc. and listen to the music.  For me, vinyl always sounds like real music comparative to digital.... there's more air, space, it sounds like these guys have been playing together for 30+ years! It's easier to follow Geddy's bass lines, Neil's complex fills....

The only substitute for good vinyl is live music.
I agree analog sound is better than digital but surely by converting this from vinyl to digital, have you changed the sound?
Beautiful turntable by the way - I was always a Linn Sondek man.
jordan is a piece of shit
